summary: 100 Streets is a British drama film directed by Jim O'Hanlon and starring Idris Elba. It made its debut in the United Kingdom on 11 November 2016, before being released in American theaters and on video-on-demand on 13 January 2017 by Samuel Goldwyn Films.
cast:
Idris Elba as Max
Gemma Arterton as Emily
Franz Drameh as Kingsley
Ken Stott as Terence
Kierston Wareing as Kathy
Charlie Creed-Miles as George
Tom Cullen as Jake
Ryan Gage as Vincent
